name: Don't SPROUTCH me!
description:
A scientific experience transformed you into a monster. You have to go to the hospital but all your friends live near by. Don't SPROUTCH (stomp) them and perhaps you may find an antidote to get back to your original form!

Controls:
  • Use the left and right keys.
  • Use the up key to jump.
Updates

0.2 : Integrate background music
0.3 : Fix some spelling mistakes

Game made by @kitty_factory team.
Special thanks to @amethystsworld for the texts.
